Method Detail

getAssetMapping

java.lang.String getAssetMapping()
Retrieves the asset path from the property [grails.assets.mapping] which is used by the url mapping and the taglib. The property cannot contain /, and must be one level deep
throws:
IllegalArgumentException if the path contains /
Returns:
the path
